markdownRemark.html: There are a few locations along the Coast where you can test your driving skills. You can try Funny Beach in Marbella or the karting at Plaza Mayor shopping centre next to Málaga airport.

frontmatter.title: Karting Experience Fuengirola (Miramar Shopping Centre)
